    Jazz

    Events

Published: February 14, 2019.
Updated: February 28, 2019.

Molly Johnson performs at the 11th annual Sudbury Jazz Festival
FRIDAY, SEPTEMBER 12 | 8PM
SATURDAY, SEPTEMBER 13 | 6PM
SUNDAY, SEPTEMBER 14 | 6PM *CLOSING NIGHT GALA
Grace Hartman Amphitheatre

Adam Leith Gollner is the author of The Book of Immortality and The Fruit Hunters, as well as co-author of the forthcoming Wildness: An Ode to Newfoundland and Labrador. His writing has appeared in The Paris Review, Vanity Fair, Smithsonian, The New York Times, The Guardian, and The New Yorker online. He lives in Montreal.
